code: import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{selectCartItems}from"../../store/cart/cart.selector";import{addItemToCart,clearItemFromCart,removeItemFromCart}from"../../store/cart/cart.action";import Button,{BUTTON_TYPE_CLASSES}from"../button/button.component";import{ProductCartContainer,Footer,Name,Price}from"./product-card.styles";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductCard=function ProductCard(_ref){var product=_ref.product;var name=product.name,price=product.price,imageUrl=product.imageUrl;var dispatch=useDispatch();var cartItems=useSelector(selectCartItems);var addProductToCart=function addProductToCart(){return dispatch(addItemToCart(cartItems,product));};var clearItemHandler=function clearItemHandler(){return dispatch(clearItemFromCart(cartItems,cartItems[0]));};var addItemHandler=function addItemHandler(){return dispatch(addItemToCart(cartItems,product));};var removeItemHandler=function removeItemHandler(){return dispatch(removeItemFromCart(cartItems,cartItems[0]));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ProductCartContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageUrl,alt:"".concat(name)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Footer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Name,{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Price,{children:["$",price,".00"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{buttonType:BUTTON_TYPE_CLASSES.inverted,onClick:addProductToCart,children:"Add to cart"})]});};export default ProductCard;
